message: Anybody here who has hosted a Django project on Heroku?
Anybody hosted a django project on Heroku?
I have a few small projects on heroku. I like it for that. I haven't done anything large yet so I can't speak to scalability, cost, etc

I'm using it as my staging area, its good enough for that, i work in a small startup and we decided not to use Heroku for our Django needs, because it's too new, we don't want to be their beta testers. We are using webfaction. But heroku its pretty awesome, use it for all your pet project needs no questions asked.
heroku is really great and stable but you can't serve static files on cedar stack w/o external CDN so you can expect "same origin policy" issues and stupid hacks to fix it
